name: LightKeeper (yummy2, Nathan Hilburn)
description:
Humanity left to roam in an unknown future..... 

Where the days grow weaker and the night stronger.  

Carry the torch to light the way... as long as you can.

Controls: 

  • Press and hold W to use your lantern
  • The A and D keys move the character left and right

Developers: Nathan Hilburn and Sai Muthukrishnan
